Still a good game in 2021!
Once you get used to the graphics, everything is amazing. 
The level design is fantastic. Enemy AI is decent. The sound effect might be dated but quite memorable. The occasional music is pretty good too.

By the way, the atmosphere is very like STALKER series. Now it makes sense why there is a Gordon Freeman reference in STALKER: Shadow of Chernobyl
